Sections.Name: AttributePoints
Sections.Description: Change options to customize the number of Attribute Points you gain when you level up.

Keys.Name: ChangeAttributePoints
Keys.Description: Change the calculation of Attribute Points. Leave this option deactivated if you want another mod to handle this.

Keys.Name: MaximumAttributePoints
Keys.Description: The highest number you can roll for Attribute Points when you level up.

Keys.Name: MinimumAttributePoints
Keys.Description: The lowest number you can roll for Attribute Points when you level up.

Keys.Name: ActivateCurvedLeveling
Keys.Description: The character will gain more attribute points at low levels and then the amount will decline as the character reaches higher levels.

Sections.Name: AttributeMaximum
Sections.Description: Change how high your characters Attribute Points can go.

Keys.Name: ChangeAttributeMaximum
Keys.Description: Change the maximum your attributes can reach. Leave this option deactivated if you want another mod to handle this.

Keys.Name: MaximumAttributePoints
Keys.Description: How high your characters attributes can go.

Sections.Name: HitPoints
Sections.Description: Change options to customize the number of HitPoints you gain when you level up.

Keys.Name: ChangeHitPoints
Keys.Description: Change the calculation of HP.Leave this option deactivated if you want another mod to handle this.

Keys.Name: MaximumHitPoints
Keys.Description: The highest number you can roll for HP when you level up.

Keys.Name: MinimumHitPoints
Keys.Description: The lowest number you can roll for HP when you level up.

Sections.Name: LevelingSpeed
Sections.Description: Change the speed at which you gain new levels.

Keys.Name: ChangeLevelingSpeed
Keys.Description: Change how fast you level. Leave this option deactivated if you want another mod to handle this.

Keys.Name: LevelSpeed
Keys.Description: How much faster or slower you level up.
